title: Cant Log in / unable to connect to pvp.net
body:
Hey everyone! 

Yesterday i went to log in and play league with some friends and was unable to because i got a connection error. " Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the pvp.net server." I have tried everything and anything to fix the problem but nothing seems to work for my connection failure. So I'm posting this in hopes that someone out there has had this problem and or knows how to fix it. I'm in patch  6.2.16_01_27_16_56

Thank you! 

Sincerely AuzArc

replies.body:
Hey AuzArc,

Please perform all the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you've already tried *all* the steps and nothing helps.

-DTN

Are you a joke? That list is no useful i tried it and nothing happens and look at the usefull rate its very low. Ive spend money on the game but this issue is making it hard to enjoy. I feel like ive been scammed
sorry im just mad i cant do anything

If you're just now having issues, it may have been due to a widespread server issue that should be fixed now. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/x72ALJh3-league-not-letting-me-log-on?comment=0023000100000000

Make a thread over on the **Help & Support** board if you continue to have issues.

Hey Deep Terror Nami, 

I have gone through all the steps on the connection troubleshooting guide and nothing seemed to work, my league of legends is still unable to log in.  I've also deleted league and re downloaded it, that didnt do anything either D:
I am currently having the same issue.... PLEASE HELP!!!
